lesson.title_and_level: Intermediate - A Call for Innovation at the Office

sentence.idiomatic: This year the company has done very well.
How are your retail sales performing?
If you want to get a raise and be promoted, you must first start making some achievements.
This year the economy is very bad.
Is the real estate market in a slump?
After he lost his job, his family's financial situation was even worse.
Wages in the IT industry are very high.
How is the situation in the food and beverage industry?
For those in the service industry, quality of service is the most important thing.
Do you have a lot of pressure at work?
Don't give him any more pressure.
China's population issue is causing more and more pressure.
This advertisement is really creative.
Their plan isn't at all creative.
His ideas are very creative.
He does clothing manufacturing.
After putting on the finishing touches, the things look even more exquisite.
We are going to take the raw materials and process them to make the final product.
You don't need to wait for me, just go straight home.
Are you going straight from the supermarket to the airport?
He speaks very directly, don't be upset.
I'm just joking, don't take offense.
I have had a boyfriend before, do you mind?
I don't mind waiting a little longer.
Wang, our company's performance this year isn't too good.
Well, this year the economy is bad, and the Renminbi has been appreciating. The export industry is under a lot of pressure.
I understand all this. But we have our own problems too.
Really? What areas do you think have problems?
Our products aren't innovative.
Zhou Jun, we're a manufacturer. Whatever our clients want, we produce.
That's why our products are getting worse and worse. Wang, I speak rather directly, don't take offense.
It's all right. But Zhou Jun, you have to understand that a lot of things are easier said than done.
But how do you know if you don't try? Wang, please do up a PPT to sum up our current production situation.
P what?
It's a computer presentation. PPT.
I know what that is. Oh, by the way, Zhou Jun, when you have some time, why don't you give us an explanation of your plan.
Sure.
